source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.
source_objects.title: Food & Beverage

items.title: Mix World-Class Cocktails - Secrets of a Champion Mixologist

visible_instructors.job_title: World Champion Mixologist, Author & International Trainer
visible_instructors.title: Paul Martin
visible_instructors.name: Paul

items.headline: Become a world-class cocktail mixer, guided by Paul Martin, the world's most prolific trainer of 30000+ bartenders
objectives_summary: A home enthusiast? Mix 5-star cocktails for family and friends, that the most skilled professional would be proud of.
Already a bartender? Develop your skills, mix truly world-class cocktails and give your career a serious boost.
Shake, stir, layer and build your drinks with the skills of the greatest mixologists.

items.title: #3 Bake Classic Sourdough Bread Like a Professional

visible_instructors.job_title: Bread Baker, Sourdough Baking Teacher, Author, Blogger
visible_instructors.title: Teresa L Greenway
visible_instructors.name: Teresa L

items.headline: Baking Classic Sourdough bread using a sourdough starter and NO KNEAD methods.
objectives_summary: Bake Some of the Best Breads in the World
Bite into a crusty, chewy, buttery slice of their own hand crafted bread.
Understand some of the mystery behind old world bread baking.

items.title: Bake San Francisco Style Sour Sourdough Bread

visible_instructors.job_title: Bread Baker, Sourdough Baking Teacher, Author, Blogger
visible_instructors.title: Teresa L Greenway
visible_instructors.name: Teresa L

items.headline: Learn to Bake Real Authentic SOUR Sourdough, San Francisco Style.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will know exactly what it takes to produce the "sour" in sourdough bread baking.
You will be able to wow anyone who likes real sour San Francisco style bread.
You will be one of the few bakers who can actually bake a "sour" loaf when others are still trying.

items.title: Wine: Everything You Want to Know, Taught by a Winemaker
items.headline: A unique education about wine from a winemaker. How it's made, and how to fully enjoy tasting and talking about it.
objectives_summary: Enjoy wine, carefree from judgement
Gain a comprehensive and real understanding of all aspects of wine
Have confidence in your knowledge of wine

items.title: Thai Cooking Master Class

visible_instructors.job_title: Master home cooks. Frequent travelers. Passionate learners.
visible_instructors.title: cooktour .com
visible_instructors.name: cooktour

items.headline: Learn to how cook better than restaurant Thai food as you discover new ingredients and elevate your cooking skills
objectives_summary: Cook better than restaurant Thai food at home

items.title: Naturally Gluten Free Sourdough Bread
items.headline: Take Your Gluten Free  Bread Making To The Next Level, Using Natural Sourdough Starter
objectives_summary: Make beautiful, artisan loaves, rolls and pizza using GF sourdough leaven and natural binders.
Make and maintain  your own, 100% natural gluten free sourdough cultures.
Understand the principles of sourdough leaven and slow dough fermentation.

items.title: The Art of Pizza Making - Soft bubbly pizza crust at home
items.headline: Neapolitan Pizza at home in 100 seconds. How to make and cooking it. Dough baking with sourdough or yeast. Best crust
objectives_summary: Learn to bake and cook a traditional Neapolitan pizza!
Learn to cook in your own home oven in 100 seconds
Find the secret for a perfect pizza by a real Neapolitan pizza chef!

items.title: Japanese Pastry Course #2 Japanese Cheesecake
items.headline: Learn how to make fluffy Japanese cotton cheese cake and bake rich cheese tarts. Amazing delicious desserts baking!
objectives_summary: Become an expert at baking amazing fluffy Japanese cheesecake and rich fluffy cheese tarts.
Learn to bake perfect crispy tart dough called "PÃ¢te sucrÃ©e".
Learn basic techniques for custard cream (pastry cream) and Italian meringue.

items.title: More Essential Cooking Skills
items.headline: Cook like a pro, master the basic techniques used in the World's culinary industry! Key Techniques - part 2
objectives_summary: Master more advanced cooking techniques which can then be used to create an endless variety of dishes.
Understand the HOW of cooking, before thinking of the WHAT to cook.

Learn the ...DEF of cooking to international standards. The basic skills covered in the course are: cooking beef fillet, rack of lamb, duck breast, veloute sauce, creamy omelette, deboning chicken, making a French onion soup, cooking fish stock, tomato concasse, mushroom duxelles or making French fries cooked three times.

items.title: INDIAN COOKING - RESTAURANT STYLE COOKING COURSE
items.headline: Learn - Base gravies (Red, Yellow, Green, White, Yellow Non veg & Makhani gravy)  Karahi chicken, Palak Paneer & more.
objectives_summary: PROFESSIONAL INDIAN COOKING FROM BEGINNERS TO EXPERTS
RESTAURANT STYLE  COOKING AT HOME

items.title: #2 ITA Certified Tea Courses-Chinese Tea Ceremony & History

visible_instructors.job_title: ITA Tea Master, Tea Author, Tea Artisan & Tea Hunter
visible_instructors.title: Shana Zhang
visible_instructors.name: Shana

items.headline: ITA Certified Tea Course,the art and science of how to brewing tea; how to practice tea ceremonies; tea ceremony history
objectives_summary: This intermediate level course will be an important level for helping you clarify your understanding of the different varieties of traditional tea ceremonies by looking at:
Where the tea ceremonies came from;
How the tea ceremonies were developed;

items.title: #8 Advanced Sourdough Bread Baking Experiments

visible_instructors.job_title: Bread Baker, Sourdough Baking Teacher, Author, Blogger

visible_instructors.name: Teresa L

items.headline: Interesting and fun methods for playing around with sourdough bread baking.
objectives_summary: Find out how to make the elusive Cristal Bread, super high hydration with large open holey crumb!
Learn different methods for fun dough treatment - boil bread!
Combine heritage grains with bread flour for a tasty loaf.

items.title: Learn How To Brew Beer At Home In 5 Easy Steps
items.headline: Beginners step by step guide through the brewing process.  Learn with minimal gear and go from grain to glass with class
objectives_summary: Clearly understand basic brewing concepts
Brew a 5 gallon batch of real beer made from water, malt, hops and yeast
Understand what yeast does during fermentation

items.title: #4 Old Fashioned Sourdough Baking

visible_instructors.job_title: Bread Baker, Sourdough Baking Teacher, Author, Blogger

visible_instructors.name: Teresa L

items.headline: Bake up Quick Bread for Breakfast - Pancakes, Biscuits, Scones, Tortillas, Cinnamon Rolls +
objectives_summary: Discover the flavors of old fashioned sourdough baking.
Griddle up some delicious flapjacks and buttery pancakes.
Bake a fluffy moist sourdough cornbread.

items.title: How to  Bake Real Artisan Bread

items.headline: Learn the skills, tricks and tips needed to make delicious artisan bread with confidence.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to bake delicious artisan bread from scratch at home

items.title: Deliciously Gluten Free Artisan Breads
items.headline: Goodbye to bricks of sawdust, and hello to lip-smacking, luscious and nutritious breads you have made all by yourself!
objectives_summary: Bake seven very different kinds of gluten free bread, rolls and pizza  mix  my own blends, and use the principles to develop recipes of my own.
